title: NFT被丢事件及后续
body:
大家好，我是Amber，

       ambermura.eth，这是 NFT 的钱包，就在昨天，因为我自己的声音被剥夺了我的所有，但我不是盗贼我从 158 天前开始爱上 NFT，被偷走 NFT 的这 30一个小时，我要崩溃了，我已经在努力证明，如果行文混乱的地方还请大家多包含。

      点击是此类的，6月16日下午，因为我了[@ChinaChic_NFT](https://twitter.com/ChinaChic_NFT) DISCORD群发的链接，[https://airdrop.murakamiflowers.club](https://t.co/z4eTI3zHA7)的链接，链接的朋友们还被悲哀地挂在了这个他们的社区里里，连接了我的钱包，电话和这个网站进行了一次合作的网络营销，之后我以为我没有什么事情发生，我以为这是出门了。

       直到晚上我回到家，我打开OPENSEA，才发现我最心爱的7个NFT已经被转走了，被盗的NFT其中包含2（mfers #5258 #4089），2（Otherdeed for Otherside #60831 #91472） 1（Meebits #8654），1（PXN：Ghost Division #3188）1（PREMINT Collector Pass - OFFICIAL #9450），请不要购买这些 NFT，因为他们可能会随时被标记，让你蒙受损失。

      我和这些 NFT 的一些故事

      在我非常喜欢这个人第8次买了会，可爱的长发小人带个小坐在电脑前的我，我的社区里，你的社区里永远感受着表亲。 猴子土地是薄荷的一个是7th爱买蜜的，meebit 8th，yugalab是FT的龙头，我相信Nyugalab不会倒下！！其中Meebits是我的。 PXN 3th，我这个项目了，我相信了时间会证明一切！！Premint 是有证据背景的抽奖工具，0.8 买了就一直用，工具在那个时候都存在任何价值！！

      在我发现 NFT 被偷了之后，我整个人都感到很伤心，我在[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky) alpha flyers 群里发了一句我的钱包被盗了，群里的很多群友都在查看我的地址，链上数据，帮我找原因，想办法，而且还帮他们搞懂合同的朋友，帮我锁定问题所在，帮我骂老王[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)里的小偷。和NFT转走，我除了坐在电脑旁边哭泣，什么也做不了，因为我已经没有什么可转的了，丢掉的就是我的全部。 我给我的闺蜜打电话了，说我的NFT偷了，她的才能也偷了，这是因为我的忽悠，但即使我买了这个女儿，我还是很难让我承担得起，因为我想花钱买NFT。但是，我真的很想知道这个世界，我还是很想知道这个世界，因为我还是很想知道这个世界。

[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)可能有很多人会追我干，我活承认，我自己是自己的另一个人拥有的人[@NFT_Aerfa 里面](https://twitter.com/NFT_Aerfa)。，或者说分享的人是[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky)阿尔法苍蝇的小型有一次重要的朋友的心，每个人都已经新的心，而且已经没有了，而且他们主有数的，不是一个心，一个目了的转移。

到现在为止，[https: //open@我不支持我打开任何](https://t.co/0KqlrWUZHA)  [sea.open](https://twitter.com/opensea)的邮件给我的任务，甚至标记都没有上。确实有很多被 NFT 相关的特例，是被标记了，看起来也禁止在[@opensea](https://twitter.com/opensea)上偷看，同样可以在@ [the_x22](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)上和[@the_x22](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)上他们在所有被偷听的 NFT 销售情况，LOOKS RARE 平台已经成为那些低等黑客已经杀掉最大的赃物了，因为[@the_x2y2](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)还至少有点良知，至少知道为什么交易给了提示， @ [LooksRare](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)你们的平台将不会出现，你们的平台除了就是你量量的脏货，为什么在给offer，总是会卖到被盗的NFT ? 你们学艺不精只能靠偷东西为什么做脏事的让你们潜伏着有流动性，让我们这些喜欢NFT的人知道连环损失，你们现在却连X2Y2也干掉了X2Y2的盘算，现在却连X2Y2也干了你们应该也是默认交易量的吧，我都看得出来在对刷，你们这么装盲？

       我帮大家把我的事件，或者可以我翻译一下，并@相关的平台，希望

       让@opensea可以处理我们的邮件，他们这一年赚的钱请及时人[真正](https://twitter.com/opensea)没有困难。

       让@ [thex2y2](https://twitter.com/opensea)、[@opensea ](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)、@看[Rare](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)将被偷走 NFT 打标，并出售。

       请让那些被 NFT 的持有者杀毒的流动性，让他们得到更多的保护办法，让等寄生虫的那些偷物再一次被偷偷的偷偷的性质，并没有任何通过降低的办法。 ，让那些发了PASS的人请先加强自己的社区管理。当然同时我们也应该增强自己的风险意识，避免被这种网站钓鱼。

NFT 的共识不应该是激烈夺取，我希望更多的是的传递。

NFT 的流动应该只是交易者的麻烦，我同时也是偷窃者的镣铐。

NFT 的未来不应该是赚了钱就软地毯，是希望共同进步让我的市场更加新生。 
 

     活动进展：

     很多朋友说的看起来都是乱序的，所以在前面我重新整理了一遍。

     在发布文案之后，我收到了很多圈内热心人的鼓励和支持。有的说带我打土狗，有的我一些钱包安全方面的知识。

     非常感谢大家，让我在这样的绝境中证明，我仍然很想拥抱web3、拥抱NFT。

     本次活动我的闺蜜也表示，同时我也表示，并继续学习，努力，希望能有回报。

     要特别感谢这位同志的名字命名[@hijasper](https://twitter.com/hiJasperNG) @hijasper，他在信中告诉我mfer help mfer，并购买并给了我一个特别感谢的人，还把我其中一个加到了mfer的群里。

     像[@the_x2y2](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)这样感慨的平台方，在第一帮我把我把也有遗弃的NFT打标签上了。

     希望引起大家的关注和分享的事件可以引起我的关注和分享。

     有朋友提到  [@SlowMist_Team](https://twitter.com/SlowMist_Team)  安全公司慢雾之前联合了很多安全界大佬写了《黑暗森林生存手册》 基本能避免99%的危险  

[https://darkhandbook.io/](https://darkhandbook.io/)

        YouTube：NFT黑魔法这期视频里面有完整的这个骗局的介绍，看他的视频可以学到很多东西。

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ashmHmdvHLE&t=1423s](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ashmHmdvHLE&t=1423s)

      我自己收拾心情后也决定不能放弃，要重新开始。

title: Addition by Subtraction
body:
I’ve been wondering how things become part of us. Our names, where we’re from, what we own, and even what we want, like our goals. Why if we want to feel whole we create the absence of something in our lives. Does this something we need to acquire or become simply distract us from ourselves? I lived most of my life wanting to become something else. I felt miserable and wanted to find another way to be happy, so instead of setting another goal, I became more of myself through subtraction. I started to look at my inputs and they showed me the layers that made up the image of who I wanted to be. This image had been my life’s motivation. It showed me why I believed what I believed, why I wanted certain things, and why when I accomplished or failed at something, I always needed a new target. Through all of it I lived for the next step, for progress, when I just needed to step back and question why I wanted these things in the first place. Most of us are conditioned this way. But we don’t think about or see any of this until we crash. But maybe if we focus on stepping back sooner we’d be able to course correct before we’re forced to. That’s what made me think of building a community like North Star. How can we create content, products, services, and experiences that encourage us to step back and reevaluate how we’re living our lives?

It start’s with understanding how to step back and looking at what we think we know. Our knowledge is a string of memories made up of direct experience and things we’ve learned from other people. Some of it is practical. For example, we want someone who’s built bridges to build the bridges we walk on. But a lot of our knowledge limits our ability to see things as they are, including ourselves. Our opinions take on the point of view that a particular set of inputs allow. Some of those being where we’re from, who we spend our time with, their beliefs, etc. So we may think we’re observing objectively, but we’re only seeing part of the truth. It’s like looking at the sky through a toilet paper roll. We only see part of the whole. We wear these goggles every day, but once we see that we’re wearing them, can’t we take them off? This seems like the only way to move forward in the “right” direction. To first step back, take the goggles off, and look at ourselves and life through a broader lens. Otherwise we see a fraction of reality, and before we know it, we’re on someone else’s path. 

Most conventional wisdom tells us to focus on the first step so we miss this. We’re supposed to keep falling down and keep getting back up. But maybe if we step back more often we can fall less. We can give ourself the chance to look at ourselves and subtract the things that are weighing us down. The things that limit how we see ourselves and the world around us. So we can see more than what we could through the toilet paper role. If we do this we can understand ourselves and others better. We can strengthen our relationships. And no matter where we are on our journey, we can always step back, look at ourselves, and find a path that suits us. We can become our own North Stars.

title: Manifoldを使ってNFTコントラクトを作成するチュートリアル
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_G0lJFNFtl5lIAe8RdFo5.jpg?height=670&width=1024)

# Manifold（manifold.xyz）ってなに

* コーディング知識なくても自分のNFTコントラクトが作成できるツール
* データの格納はArweaveです、IPFSと違う方法で半永久に保存する分散型ストレージネットワーク
* データサイズの上限は200MB
* Ethereumメインネット（とテスト環境のRinkeby）だけ対応
* ERC-721（一品物に適する規格）とERC-1155（一品物も、同じものが複数あるもの（入札プレゼントとか）も作れる規格）に対応
* コントラクトデプロイ・NFTミント・ロイヤリティ設定にガス代は必要
* ミントしたあとも、ガス代払えばmetadataのピーク変更は可能、例えばタイプミス修正とか、季節が変わったら背景も変わるなど特殊な作品も実現可能
* ERC-721でも一応ナンバリング（Nanika #1/10, Nanika #2/10…みたいなやつ）ができる機能があります（量が多いとガス代は跳ね上がります）
* ERC-1155で作ったものは一度に複数のアドレスにエアドロができる機能
* ホルダーのスナップショット機能もあります

## そもそも「独自コントラクト」とは何か

「独自コントラクト（略して独コン）」とは本来「**自分でSolidityというプログラミング言語でコードを書いたスマートコントラクト**」です、でも日本のNFTコミュニティでは多分ニュアンスが違って、「マーケットプレイス（特にOpenSea）共用コントラクト以外のコントラクト」という意味になってると私は思います

Manifold経由で作成されたコントラクトはあくまで「**Manifoldが提供してるテンプレから生成されたコントラクト**」です、Chocofactory経由もFoundation経由も同様です

でもManifold / Chocofactory / Foundation経由でデプロイしたコントラクトの所有者はクリエイター自身です、Web3というバズワードの哲学的にクリエイターはプラットフォームの共用コントラクトではなく、自分のコントラクトで自分の作品をミントすべきです

FoundationのCEOも言ってます

[https://twitter.com/saturnial/status/1489082568330731520](https://twitter.com/saturnial/status/1489082568330731520)

# 事前準備

1\. ガス代の準備、今30 gwei以下になることが多いので、0.02 ETHあれば大丈夫なはずです、もし120 gweiに高騰したら（単純に4倍になるわけではありませんが）0.08 ETHくらいでしょうか

2\. テスト環境のRinkeby上のテスト用ETHが要ります、このRinkeby Faucetから無料で受け取れます

[https://rinkebyfaucet.com/](https://rinkebyfaucet.com/)

自分のアドレスを入れて

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1gvPnKTTI_cB_QvsSYFsN.png?height=757&width=1396)

完了です

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/osB3NlJAOVem3sq1VRzTH.png?height=1045&width=1344)

Rinkeby上のテスト用0.1 ETHもらってます、当然このETHは売れません

[https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x705a3c4f7c939e626915bf2a134d6abc444231921493dfa7f9326502697d7d20](https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x705a3c4f7c939e626915bf2a134d6abc444231921493dfa7f9326502697d7d20)

3\. Manifoldのアカウント

<https://studio.manifold.xyz> にアクセスして

[https://studio.manifold.xyz/](https://studio.manifold.xyz/)

Connectして署名して

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m_VFR_neyrVCYM9GqHLPP.png?height=799&width=906)

登録して完了です

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mzltAhIq6P8AGkxTaDL-s.png?height=1237&width=1117)

# 実際にやってみる（ERC-1155）

### テスト用コントラクトをデプロイ

<https://>[studio.manifold.xyz](https://studio.manifold.xyz) にアクセスしてNew contract

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Fy-JgBLXlLGYcwdhWo4co.png?height=313&width=1663)

* Contract nameはunicode対応
* Symbolは英字大文字
* ASCII markはこだわりがなければ適当でいいです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pv4da4ns0nOILFJvmGDzA.png?height=1147&width=1636)

Deploy on Rinkeby押してウォレットでトランザクション通して、3～5分くらい待てばVerifyまで進むはずです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6SBN2NOcIA_c3vO0XlzFT.png?height=682&width=810)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F_ScokVqL6CKjs_6yhgfh.png?height=529&width=823)

### テスト用NFTをミント

Rinkeby上にテスト用のNFTをミントします（一応この手順はスキップできますが、やっておきましょうね）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-rueza1FQxJbzdjB0lofT.png?height=981&width=1681)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IJ9aHhVH_G8UlrBI7AiF7.png?height=600&width=1675)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YCOGiKAKmKUE9lCA1Dc5E.png?height=1390&width=1834)

下の方に属性（Properties）項目があります、キャラの髪色とか、服装とか、背景のロケ地とか、いろいろ自由に設定できます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3wsHPo_WJOdEB2OtI0EIM.png?height=388&width=1114)

ミントするときの受取先は「Airdrop」と「自分」が選べます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pGcKtZqx2Kk0jt8cHKkca.png?height=744&width=1108)

ERC-1155ならAirdropの受取先は一度に複数のアドレスにミントできます、ガス代節約になります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3BGY-KupFj9UJBzeSciHM.png?height=879&width=1213)

Airdropのトランザクションを通してVerifyが完了すると大量に🔥と💎が画面に湧いてきます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UlwjD1PAYZkO5pieClgMT.png?height=1425&width=2038)

### 本番環境（ETHメインネット）にコントラクトをデプロイ

いよいよイーサリアムのメインネットにデプロイします、一度デプロイすると、名前・シンボル・タイプ（ERC-721 / ERC-1155）・ASCIIアートは永久に変更できないので、タイプミスがないか、本当にこの名前でいいか、よくチェックしてから進んでください

DashboardのDeploy on mainnetを押して

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bbxL0CIvcnYxnm9ylg-HJ.png?height=1048&width=1690)

ここはガス代が要ります、実際は0.0057 ETHを使いました

[https://etherscan.io/tx/0x8e122522e64fed94a1f06f3497378d3f4e916d89aac01ac7ca24ae340d8f43c6](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x8e122522e64fed94a1f06f3497378d3f4e916d89aac01ac7ca24ae340d8f43c6)

トランザクションが通したらVerifyまで待ちます、Rinbekyでやったことと同じです

### 本番環境（ETHメインネット）にNFTをミント

先にRinkebyに作ったNFTをイーサリアムのメインネットにデプロイします、Mint on Mainnetを押して受取先を選びます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1ZDVkIq0l6YgOH3jp7naQ.png?height=1153&width=1869)

テスト用のものと違い、本番用はArweaveにアップロードするので時間がかかります、場合によって10分以上かかることもあります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rRbeKKHD2UVoZHKYAZ8_J.png?height=702&width=609)

Awaiting signatureまで進んだらミントのトランザクションです、ガス代は要ります、2つのアドレスにAirdropして0.0048 ETHを使いました

[https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb5f295e00478a76d9124c91435a35e56b2b98146d2d2717b307e68ce12705b1c](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb5f295e00478a76d9124c91435a35e56b2b98146d2d2717b307e68ce12705b1c)

🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nuSr3cI6PYEy4VMwmbTej.png?height=1339&width=1833)

ERC-1155ならあとから追加ミントもできます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6TVG1Xz_BbCsi4u1y3RAl.png?height=1131&width=1132)

### ロイヤリティ設定

別にロイヤリティ要らない人はスキップしてください

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nK8loxslhx8ZygMCdRHqs.png?height=1240&width=838)

「OpenSea以外のマーケットプレイス（LooksRareやRarible）」でのロイヤリティ受取先とパーセントを設定します、OpenSea上のロイヤリティは赤いリンクから別途設定する必要があります

![4.2069%やりたいですけど小数点4桁はサポートされてませんね……](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dFJKw5B5-JbYZMlcKFJQD.png?height=769&width=1606)

当然直接にコントラクトからでも設定できます、basisPoints: 810はロイヤリティ8.1%という意味です

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7KhQgaHNJM2EYJm98doPX.png?height=460&width=922)


---

## 実際にやってみる（ERC-721）

基本的にはERC-1155と大差ないです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l8qjq6OWm-Y4aoQ9TmRpz.png?height=844&width=1669)

しかしAirdropは一度に1つのアドレスへしかミントできません

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UnLVhA0kI3D8amrIne6Si.png?height=652&width=813)

同じものをナンバリングにしてミントする機能もありますが

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JkYyeRdphml_LC9IkoMjG.png?height=460&width=622)

こっちは1つだけのガス代

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dlxEKf5SD1fr58lVfj-G4.png?height=535&width=477)

こっちは#1, #2, #3を一斉にミントするガス代、高くなります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7aEp_t-J2oRZtjxu5IZqL.png?height=529&width=463)


---

## 各マーケットプレイスで確認

ERC-721で作ったほうはOpenSeaでは自分でコレクションの名前を設定する必要がありました、なんで……

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JKZz4AMZQMKuUqEkFkXE3.png?height=1221&width=1890)

LooksRareやRaribleは普通にmetadataとロイヤリティ読み込めてます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5rOjxCm_NhOHsPXkNz0p7.png?height=1570&width=1777)

ERC-1155で作った方、LooksRareでは上手くコレクションタイトルと作品タイトルが表示できません

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5jETs_aoWnpMy32gAv2Lr.png?height=1732&width=2010)

OpenSeaとRaribleでは問題ないです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qXlAbKeVULSdjtlBlL06F.png?height=1635&width=2098)


---

## 他にいろいろ

現時点のガス代教えてくれたり

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/t2I0lfoIToQBPQ7bBIOpX.png?height=678&width=463)

ホルダースナップショット機能もあります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/G1yfqXIuxMho27GIdm9rv.png?height=342&width=1111)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4lA3QgNM0q-nyn1Pax7Dz.png?height=925&width=1183)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fO_4iVPq9vEV93462KbgC.png?height=786&width=1195)


---

# 最後になにか

記事を書くために約0.03 ETHを使ったので、もし寄付する感じでよくわからないなにかを購入すると助かります、あえてOpenSeaではないマーケットプレイスのリンクを出します

~~売れる気はありません~~

（2022年3月14日追記）「なにか」が売れてしまいました😳😳😳 [龍犬](https://twitter.com/ryuudog2)さん本当にありがとうございます🙏😭

よくわからないすごいなにか、0.039 ETH、ERC-721規格の一品物です、Raribleにどうでもいいアンロックコンテンツがあります

[https://rarible.com/token/0x91476502b93e73f5458aac1c133ab4b7c299982b:1?tab=details](https://rarible.com/token/0x91476502b93e73f5458aac1c133ab4b7c299982b:1?tab=details)

[https://looksrare.org/collections/0x91476502b93e73F5458AAc1c133aB4B7c299982b/1](https://looksrare.org/collections/0x91476502b93e73F5458AAc1c133aB4B7c299982b/1)

ショボーンさんの顔面、0.0069 ETH、供給量69、ERC-1155規格のものです

[https://rarible.com/token/0x6b321c1f6f94ae1641e03bdf0752061fba71924d:1](https://rarible.com/token/0x6b321c1f6f94ae1641e03bdf0752061fba71924d:1)

[https://looksrare.org/collections/0x6B321c1f6F94AE1641E03bDf0752061FBa71924D/1#about](https://looksrare.org/collections/0x6B321c1f6F94AE1641E03bDf0752061FBa71924D/1#about)

title: The Hardest Lesson We Learned from the Crypto Market (June 2022)
body:
### No Alternative Solution.

**The haze of inflation is haunting every single mainstream country around the world.**

The Ukrainian war, the pandemic, and the disruption of the global supply chain... It is undeniable that under the trend of globalization during the past two decades, no country can stay away from crisis to thrive and be happy by itself. The tremendous amount of oil and gas from Russia, the high-quality and affordable industrial products from China, and grains produced by Ukraine as the "granary of Europe"... The supply of these readily available daily necessities have all been interrupted abruptly.

Whether it is the United States, Europe or other developed regions, the vigilance of rising inflation has exceeded the desire to stimulate the economy. The 8-10% inflation is enough to put many families into difficult situations. However, due to the disrupted supply chain, it seems that there is only one applicable solution—raising interest rates.

![U.S. Inflation Hits 40-Year High](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ge1WYOR6QGj-6U-30JTWB.png?height=1364&width=1934)

Although everyone knows that raising interest rates will likely bring about a recession, central banks do not have an alternative solution to tame inflation. Only when interest rates are raised and the price of all kinds of assets falls, inflation can be contained.

The United States, in particular, is the most sensitive in this regard. The U.S. raised first, and then Europe, along with the rest of the world, had to follow. It's like the last round of a poker game. The player before has already raised, you have to call even if you don't have any cards in your hands.

Under interest rates raising, all risk assets no longer have any support. Unfortunately, Bitcoin, Ethereum, are just classified as "risk assets" for now.

### The Cycle Theory

I am still optimistic on Bitcoin, Ethereum and Crypto for the long term, but the exodus of funds from the market is not at one's will.

Do you believe in the Super Cycle Theory? The so-called Super Cycle means that crypto assets experience a bull and bear cycle every 4 years. The most direct support for this theory comes from Bitcoin’s halving every four years (the change in selling pressure). Admittedly, the Super Cycle Theory has been in effect 3 times since 2011.

![The Bitcoin Super Cycle
](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/saTAeVTOPs6tmBwuR-iaV.jpeg?height=720&width=1280)

I'm not a fan of the Super Cycle Theory. Because if this is the case — attributing market performance to some sort of fate is undoubtedly killing the efforts of countless builders in the entire crypto industry.

However, if you ask me whether I prefer any predictive graphics, then I'm more aligned with Gartner's Hype Cycle Theory.

![The Hype Cycle Curve](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bYleQ_Kb5OS2NyGAzAzn6.png?height=970&width=1444)

What it implies is the law of development and evolution of things, especially technology.

In the very beginning people tend to advocate bubbles because they are never falsified. Once the development becomes too fast, some bubbles are inevitable. The group of people who are not advocating bubbles will try to criticize bubble advocators (like now!). Then, it comes to the time to gradually build and develop.     

Then the Hype Cycle goes round by round, one round interlocking another.

It is very similar to the Super Cycle, but not identical:

→ The 2013 Bitcoin bull market enlightened the public to the technology of blockchain, so we got Ethereum in 2015.

→ The bull market in 2017 made everyone realize the strength of smart contracts, so we had DeFi in 2019.

→ The 21-year bull market has made us realize that DeFi and NFT can create so many incredible things, so we are destined to harvest new seeds in the future.

The germination of new seeds needs more time.

So, I remain firmly optimistic on the long-term future of Bitcoin and Ethereum. Of course, in the short-to-medium term, they cannot stay completely independent from traditional financial markets and the global economy. Whether it is Bitcoin or crypto, it is only a technology that has been born for a little bit over ten years. So, we might be facing a very tough period of time.

### The Most Expensive Lesson 

We always learn something from history. If the next bull market is to be brewed, it is crucial to understand what we can learn from this collapse, which is the title of this article.

I think there is only one thing that we all must learn: don't take a moment as forever.

What does it mean not to take a moment as forever?

Let’s start with the degen APR.

![Degen APR](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ITfagAJ5NIM9Mw0E9B25f.png?height=1096&width=2078)

Before the DeFi Summer, we invested in a token. Then it went to Pancake's Farm, and APR was 300%+. Super comfy passive income. Later, that pool was listed by Alpaca again, so that you can leverage it to farm. After the leverage is applied, we don’t even need cash to farm anymore. With that Token, we can collateralize it by itself to borrow and farm. The income can easily reach 10,000%+.

It means that as long as I deposit 200,000 USD, a year later, I theoretically have 20 M.

At that moment, our office was overfilled with joy. After all, even a simple $CAKE can generate thousands of dollars for me everyday, not to mention the additional rewards from using leverage and $Alpaca — I don't seem to need to work anymore.

But is this forever? Obviously not haha. Frens who have farmed pool 2 are familiar with the plot afterwards.

### DeFi is like this, so does NFT

![Post Mint](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U3bhcpRuCuXNObBiXh8sz.png?height=980&width=1468)

Let's talk about another illusion.

If you buy an animal as your avatar, you not only get an avatar, but soon you will get a dog, then a mutated animal, and then some tokens that these animals will use, even two parcels of land where these animals will live in the future…

Furthermore, each of these can be sold. If you think about it, you can earn back the principal and profit within less than a year.

Will you buy it?

I clearly remember that on the eve of the airdrop, my bros and I were very hesitant, super Fomo. It is really hard for us to decide whether we should buy some apes. During the period when $APE was airdropped, the price of BAYC also rose, and the price of $APE also rose. At that moment, the entire metaverse was thrilled.

Of course, at this moment, you and I already know, this is not forever.

### Even “Stablecoins”

The moment when UST was the most popular is the moment when UST’s market value of UST exceeds that of DAI. At that moment,  all farmers around the world went wild.

At the time, although MakerDAO executives thought $DAI was better, they could only express a little bit of sourness on Twitter. And this has also attracted cyber violence from Lunatics. 

![Lunatics](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yzvtDUW1yZpfOR5-ThL52.png?height=1086&width=1444)

$UST, a tens of billions USD scale "stablecoin", is smoothly transferrable in 10+ chains, and has hundreds of millions of liquidity in Curve and Terraswap. Orders at the level of 10M USD will not generate any slippage at all. What's even stronger is that it can yield a super stable 20% annualized interest rate.

For some Korean companies, even if they work hard for a whole year, they can't earn more than 20%. So it is better to put money into Anchor, safe and sound.

One of the things I heard the most is that UST is "too big to fail" despite it seems to have some problems.

But is it permanent?

When Luna dropped from 120 to 0.00012, some people were still betting that it would return to peg. However, everything could not go back to the good old same way anymore. Many people have lost their money, and then they discovered that this "peg" does not exist at all.

Like I talked before, Curve is a completely neutral tool. Within its central range, even if two assets are totally irrelevant, its AMM algorithm can anchor them and allow people to swap without slippage.

![The Curve AMM Curve](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FwajmtR_mNdUyMz21VJub.png?height=868&width=1420)

Once it departs from the central range, as long as a small amount of panicked liquidity escapes, it is enough to bring the AMM curve back to the prototype and accelerate the crash.

For the same reason, there are also: bribes that can bring immediate 3x returns, mysterious internet magic currency, club pass worth 40 ETH, IOUs that can be exchanged to cash 1:1 ratio, etc., I will not list them one by one.

** 
 **

### Dominoes

If it is a powerful medicine to remove $UST from crypto, then that's fine. However, what Luna has brought to the industry is more than that.

Luna, once a top 5 cryptocurrency, has spread to every corner. And its demise is bringing a series of tragedies. For what already happened, there are two immediate consequences:

1\. Weakened Liquidity

Several super-large crypto MMs, who were crucial liquidity maintainers of the crypto market in the past, have suffered greatly.

Whether it is investing in Luna, lending money to Luna, providing liquidity to UST, or the farmer of UST (except collateralized ETH to borrow UST), without exception, all of them have suffered from severe damage.

Just like in a game, when inhibitors are almost gone, no one is going to defend towers anymore. You can clearly feel that after the collapse of Luna, the liquidity of the entire market was shriveled.

2\. Forced to sell

Top institutions, including Celsius and 3AC, have established a good reputation for a long time. They also have a lot of liabilities (whether from LPs, friends or users), which is a normal business expansion behavior. In terms of their size, when the liquidity is normal, they can slowly repay the money without problems.

I believe that at the moment they got the money, both parties were very satisfied.

However, the good times are also not permanent.

Today, cryptocurrencies continue to decline during the interest rate raise cycle. As collateral shrinks, these institutions are left with fewer options. Selling their remaining assets to stop loss is one of the few options. Yet the shaking market performance simply can't handle such a large sell-off.

This is probably a death spiral. The more urgently you sell to repay the debt or make up the margin, the more severe the fall, and the more urgent the debt repayment will become.** 
 **

### Yet to Happen 

In addition to these two immediate consequences, there is one more outcome that will probably happen soon.

3\. A new round of regulation

With the complaints from Celsius individual investors and the accusations of Luna investors, it's hard to imagine that regulation won't catch up.

At this moment, it is impossible for crypto to draw lines to exclude Luna. The general public outside crypto will not differentiate Luna from other cryptocurrencies at all. When the supervision is in need of materials, the cases of Luna and Celsius will be brought up, and even 3AC. A wave of strong supervision against Crypto is 100% foreseeable.

No Snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible. In any case, none of those who once advocated for ponzi ever feel responsible for the current BTC avalanche.

When Luna was at its peak, many organizations believed it was "too big to fail". A lie told a thousand times became the truth. I sincerely hope that everyone will stop advocating any Ponzi, stop believing in any "too big to fail", and stop "taking a moment as forever".

### Last few words. 

I used to have a "yearly strategies update", updating my understanding of the entire market and my portfolio every year. The recommendation in 2019 is mainly about the Auto-Invest plan of BTC, and the recommendation in 2020 is to switch some positions to ETH.

If you let me talk about a strategy for now, it may still be about waiting for opportunities and the right timing.

My current positions are mainly BTC, USDC/USDT, and a tiny bit of altcoins and PFPs. At this point, there is not much room to panic sell mainstream coins, but there is still a lot of downward room for alts.

About buying the dip. 
 

![Buying the Dip](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NlTmiP6cMyS0qK2mCznFu.png?height=1080&width=1094)

I think buying $stETH below $800 might be the right choice for long-term holders.

![ETH/USD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9gxLyOj1FSsokF65xrdc4.png?height=1006&width=2672)

$800 is one of the starting points of the last bull market, and stETH should indeed have some additional discounts. Long-term holders can definitely wait until the day when stETH is converted into real ETH.

For the future technical route of Ethereum, I am very optimistic about the combination of PoS ETH+Rollups. Based on this route, real web 3.0 applications can finally run on Ethereum at an ultra-low cost, and enjoy Ethereum’s security without having to consider high gas fees. The environmental problems and inflation problems of Ethereum will also be solved by PoS.

In addition, BTC is always my favorite. I will choose to start my automatic investment plan when the right time comes. In the past six months, all of us have observed BTC’s excellent liquidity. After all, liquidity is the king. Moreover, the interest rate raise will eventually end, and monetary easing is the eternal hymn.

![Meme of Bitcoin](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_oKJV2_fYfaYVIxL5bfsU.png?height=1228&width=1600)

Finally, if this is your first time being in a bear market, don't be too frustrated. The war will end, the pandemic will end, inflation will be tamed, and monetary easing will arrive and last. Every second in the bear market is a great opportunity to build and learn. Remember, don’t take the dark moment as forever either.

 **

title: pour holy water into the ocean
body:
I am a friendly person, because when I meet people I say hi and hello and I ask them how their trip went and I ask them if I can get them anything and I ask them if they are sure, are you sure, it’s no burden at all.

I am a friendly person because there are about two people on Earth whose physical proximity to me has a better-than-negative effect on my mood, but I hide it well.

Acting is acting. The mask is the mask. I am, who I am, but that isn’t all I have to be. I can infuse myself with the beliefs of others, I can become an egregore of friendliness, people will believe me to be friendly and then I will simply be friendly thanks to the generative power of belief which I truly believe in, not in a spiritual way, in a physical, material way, I believe in manifestation.

What happens to me, or who I see myself to be, if I manifest something else in my place? Will I be:

1. large enough to contain multitudes, I will be Friendly and also my friendly-larp self, I will be myself and more, I will be 1 + 0.1.
2. A ship of theseus continued identity, the same entity, transformed, reformed, reconstituted, something lost but not all of it, the same person, but a little different, I will be 0.9 + 0.1.
3. Lost forever, the recipe is wrong, four bits were flipped as a result of cosmic bombardment, my 256-bit private key has been transformed in some unknown way ergo I have lost my private key with the terrible totality of cryptographic security, new person, new identity, new birth, new only new continuity obliterated. all is lost. 0 + 1.

When I Don the Milady I become someone new Online. I am neither the person I am in physical space, nor am I the person I am when I am alone. Distinct identity, separate from myself.

Except, the faucet is leaky. All faucets are, imperceptibly, eventually. I pour from my special cup I reserve for the TL, onto the TL, and nature abhors a vacuum. My cup is submerged in the TL. The TL rushes to occupy the empty space. When I leave the TL the TL is still in the cup. I pour out the cup but the miracle of adhesion holds some trace amounts of the TL intact on my cup.

Some dripping occurs. I use the same sponge to clean my TL cup as I use to clean my private identity cup. Particulate. Sticky particulate. Buildup. A persistence I didn’t want but will never be rid of.

If you pour properly consecrated Holy Water into the ocean, have you created a Holy Ocean? Has anybody tried this yet?

```
 大家好，我是Amber，

   ambermura.eth，这是 NFT 的钱包，就在昨天，因为我自己的声音被剥夺了我的所有，但我不是盗贼我从 158 天前开始爱上 NFT，被偷走 NFT 的这 30一个小时，我要崩溃了，我已经在努力证明，如果行文混乱的地方还请大家多包含。

  点击是此类的，6月16日下午，因为我了[@ChinaChic_NFT](https://twitter.com/ChinaChic_NFT) DISCORD群发的链接，[https://airdrop.murakamiflowers.club](https://t.co/z4eTI3zHA7)的链接，链接的朋友们还被悲哀地挂在了这个他们的社区里里，连接了我的钱包，电话和这个网站进行了一次合作的网络营销，之后我以为我没有什么事情发生，我以为这是出门了。

   直到晚上我回到家，我打开OPENSEA，才发现我最心爱的7个NFT已经被转走了，被盗的NFT其中包含2（mfers #5258 #4089），2（Otherdeed for Otherside #60831 #91472） 1（Meebits #8654），1（PXN：Ghost Division #3188）1（PREMINT Collector Pass - OFFICIAL #9450），请不要购买这些 NFT，因为他们可能会随时被标记，让你蒙受损失。

  我和这些 NFT 的一些故事

  在我非常喜欢这个人第8次买了会，可爱的长发小人带个小坐在电脑前的我，我的社区里，你的社区里永远感受着表亲。 猴子土地是薄荷的一个是7th爱买蜜的，meebit 8th，yugalab是FT的龙头，我相信Nyugalab不会倒下！！其中Meebits是我的。 PXN 3th，我这个项目了，我相信了时间会证明一切！！Premint 是有证据背景的抽奖工具，0.8 买了就一直用，工具在那个时候都存在任何价值！！

  在我发现 NFT 被偷了之后，我整个人都感到很伤心，我在[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky) alpha flyers 群里发了一句我的钱包被盗了，群里的很多群友都在查看我的地址，链上数据，帮我找原因，想办法，而且还帮他们搞懂合同的朋友，帮我锁定问题所在，帮我骂老王[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)里的小偷。和NFT转走，我除了坐在电脑旁边哭泣，什么也做不了，因为我已经没有什么可转的了，丢掉的就是我的全部。 我给我的闺蜜打电话了，说我的NFT偷了，她的才能也偷了，这是因为我的忽悠，但即使我买了这个女儿，我还是很难让我承担得起，因为我想花钱买NFT。但是，我真的很想知道这个世界，我还是很想知道这个世界，因为我还是很想知道这个世界。
```

```
  我和这些 NFT 的一些故事

  在我非常喜欢这个人第8次买了会，可爱的长发小人带个小坐在电脑前的我，我的社区里，你的社区里永远感受着表亲。 猴子土地是薄荷的一个是7th爱买蜜的，meebit 8th，yugalab是FT的龙头，我相信Nyugalab不会倒下！！其中Meebits是我的。 PXN 3th，我这个项目了，我相信了时间会证明一切！！Premint 是有证据背景的抽奖工具，0.8 买了就一直用，工具在那个时候都存在任何价值！！

  在我发现 NFT 被偷了之后，我整个人都感到很伤心，我在[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky) alpha flyers 群里发了一句我的钱包被盗了，群里的很多群友都在查看我的地址，链上数据，帮我找原因，想办法，而且还帮他们搞懂合同的朋友，帮我锁定问题所在，帮我骂老王[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)里的小偷。和NFT转走，我除了坐在电脑旁边哭泣，什么也做不了，因为我已经没有什么可转的了，丢掉的就是我的全部。 我给我的闺蜜打电话了，说我的NFT偷了，她的才能也偷了，这是因为我的忽悠，但即使我买了这个女儿，我还是很难让我承担得起，因为我想花钱买NFT。但是，我真的很想知道这个世界，我还是很想知道这个世界，因为我还是很想知道这个世界。
```

[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)可能有很多人会追我干，我活承认，我自己是自己的另一个人拥有的人[@NFT_Aerfa 里面](https://twitter.com/NFT_Aerfa)。，或者说分享的人是[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky)阿尔法苍蝇的小型有一次重要的朋友的心，每个人都已经新的心，而且已经没有了，而且他们主有数的，不是一个心，一个目了的转移。

到现在为止，[https: //open@我不支持我打开任何](https://t.co/0KqlrWUZHA)  [sea.open](https://twitter.com/opensea)的邮件给我的任务，甚至标记都没有上。确实有很多被 NFT 相关的特例，是被标记了，看起来也禁止在[@opensea](https://twitter.com/opensea)上偷看，同样可以在@ [the_x22](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)上和[@the_x22](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)上他们在所有被偷听的 NFT 销售情况，LOOKS RARE 平台已经成为那些低等黑客已经杀掉最大的赃物了，因为[@the_x2y2](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)还至少有点良知，至少知道为什么交易给了提示， @ [LooksRare](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)你们的平台将不会出现，你们的平台除了就是你量量的脏货，为什么在给offer，总是会卖到被盗的NFT ? 你们学艺不精只能靠偷东西为什么做脏事的让你们潜伏着有流动性，让我们这些喜欢NFT的人知道连环损失，你们现在却连X2Y2也干掉了X2Y2的盘算，现在却连X2Y2也干了你们应该也是默认交易量的吧，我都看得出来在对刷，你们这么装盲？

```
   我帮大家把我的事件，或者可以我翻译一下，并@相关的平台，希望

   让@opensea可以处理我们的邮件，他们这一年赚的钱请及时人[真正](https://twitter.com/opensea)没有困难。

   让@ [thex2y2](https://twitter.com/opensea)、[@opensea ](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)、@看[Rare](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)将被偷走 NFT 打标，并出售。

   请让那些被 NFT 的持有者杀毒的流动性，让他们得到更多的保护办法，让等寄生虫的那些偷物再一次被偷偷的偷偷的性质，并没有任何通过降低的办法。 ，让那些发了PASS的人请先加强自己的社区管理。当然同时我们也应该增强自己的风险意识，避免被这种网站钓鱼。
```

NFT 的共识不应该是激烈夺取，我希望更多的是的传递。

NFT 的流动应该只是交易者的麻烦，我同时也是偷窃者的镣铐。

NFT 的未来不应该是赚了钱就软地毯，是希望共同进步让我的市场更加新生。

```
 活动进展：

 很多朋友说的看起来都是乱序的，所以在前面我重新整理了一遍。

 在发布文案之后，我收到了很多圈内热心人的鼓励和支持。有的说带我打土狗，有的我一些钱包安全方面的知识。

 非常感谢大家，让我在这样的绝境中证明，我仍然很想拥抱web3、拥抱NFT。

 本次活动我的闺蜜也表示，同时我也表示，并继续学习，努力，希望能有回报。
```

title: NFT被丢事件及后续
body:
```
  
```

```
 大家好，我是Amber，

   ambermura.eth，这是 NFT 的钱包，就在昨天，因为我自己的声音被剥夺了我的所有，但我不是盗贼我从 158 天前开始爱上 NFT，被偷走 NFT 的这 30一个小时，我要崩溃了，我已经在努力证明，如果行文混乱的地方还请大家多包含。

  点击是此类的，6月16日下午，因为我了[@ChinaChic_NFT](https://twitter.com/ChinaChic_NFT) DISCORD群发的链接，[https://airdrop.murakamiflowers.club](https://t.co/z4eTI3zHA7)的链接，链接的朋友们还被悲哀地挂在了这个他们的社区里里，连接了我的钱包，电话和这个网站进行了一次合作的网络营销，之后我以为我没有什么事情发生，我以为这是出门了。

   直到晚上我回到家，我打开OPENSEA，才发现我最心爱的7个NFT已经被转走了，被盗的NFT其中包含2（mfers #5258 #4089），2（Otherdeed for Otherside #60831 #91472） 1（Meebits #8654），1（PXN：Ghost Division #3188）1（PREMINT Collector Pass - OFFICIAL #9450），请不要购买这些 NFT，因为他们可能会随时被标记，让你蒙受损失。

  我和这些 NFT 的一些故事

  在我非常喜欢这个人第8次买了会，可爱的长发小人带个小坐在电脑前的我，我的社区里，你的社区里永远感受着表亲。 猴子土地是薄荷的一个是7th爱买蜜的，meebit 8th，yugalab是FT的龙头，我相信Nyugalab不会倒下！！其中Meebits是我的。 PXN 3th，我这个项目了，我相信了时间会证明一切！！Premint 是有证据背景的抽奖工具，0.8 买了就一直用，工具在那个时候都存在任何价值！！

  在我发现 NFT 被偷了之后，我整个人都感到很伤心，我在[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky) alpha flyers 群里发了一句我的钱包被盗了，群里的很多群友都在查看我的地址，链上数据，帮我找原因，想办法，而且还帮他们搞懂合同的朋友，帮我锁定问题所在，帮我骂老王[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)里的小偷。和NFT转走，我除了坐在电脑旁边哭泣，什么也做不了，因为我已经没有什么可转的了，丢掉的就是我的全部。 我给我的闺蜜打电话了，说我的NFT偷了，她的才能也偷了，这是因为我的忽悠，但即使我买了这个女儿，我还是很难让我承担得起，因为我想花钱买NFT。但是，我真的很想知道这个世界，我还是很想知道这个世界，因为我还是很想知道这个世界。
```

# #事件经过

```
大家好，我是Amber，
```

```
   ambermura.eth，这是 NFT 的钱包，就在昨天，因为我自己的声音被剥夺了我的所有，但我不是盗贼我从 158 天前开始爱上 NFT，被偷走 NFT 的这 30一个小时，我要崩溃了，我已经在努力证明，如果行文混乱的地方还请大家多包含。

  点击是此类的，6月16日下午，因为我了[@ChinaChic_NFT](https://twitter.com/ChinaChic_NFT) DISCORD群发的链接，[https://airdrop.murakamiflowers.club](https://t.co/z4eTI3zHA7)的链接，链接的朋友们还被悲哀地挂在了这个他们的社区里里，连接了我的钱包，电话和这个网站进行了一次合作的网络营销，之后我以为我没有什么事情发生，我以为这是出门了。

   直到晚上我回到家，我打开OPENSEA，才发现我最心爱的7个NFT已经被转走了，被盗的NFT其中包含2（mfers #5258 #4089），2（Otherdeed for Otherside #60831 #91472） 1（Meebits #8654），1（PXN：Ghost Division #3188）1（PREMINT Collector Pass - OFFICIAL #9450），请不要购买这些 NFT，因为他们可能会随时被标记，让你蒙受损失。

  我和这些 NFT 的一些故事

  在我非常喜欢这个人第8次买了会，可爱的长发小人带个小坐在电脑前的我，我的社区里，你的社区里永远感受着表亲。 猴子土地是薄荷的一个是7th爱买蜜的，meebit 8th，yugalab是FT的龙头，我相信Nyugalab不会倒下！！其中Meebits是我的。 PXN 3th，我这个项目了，我相信了时间会证明一切！！Premint 是有证据背景的抽奖工具，0.8 买了就一直用，工具在那个时候都存在任何价值！！

  在我发现 NFT 被偷了之后，我整个人都感到很伤心，我在[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky) alpha flyers 群里发了一句我的钱包被盗了，群里的很多群友都在查看我的地址，链上数据，帮我找原因，想办法，而且还帮他们搞懂合同的朋友，帮我锁定问题所在，帮我骂老王[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)里的小偷。和NFT转走，我除了坐在电脑旁边哭泣，什么也做不了，因为我已经没有什么可转的了，丢掉的就是我的全部。 我给我的闺蜜打电话了，说我的NFT偷了，她的才能也偷了，这是因为我的忽悠，但即使我买了这个女儿，我还是很难让我承担得起，因为我想花钱买NFT。但是，我真的很想知道这个世界，我还是很想知道这个世界，因为我还是很想知道这个世界。
```

[@V1JeromeLoo](https://twitter.com/V1JeromeLoo)可能有很多人会追我干，我活承认，我自己是自己的另一个人拥有的人[@NFT_Aerfa 里面](https://twitter.com/NFT_Aerfa)。，或者说分享的人是[@RonnieDcky](https://twitter.com/RonnieDcky)阿尔法苍蝇的小型有一次重要的朋友的心，每个人都已经新的心，而且已经没有了，而且他们主有数的，不是一个心，一个目了的转移。

到现在为止，[https: //open@我不支持我打开任何](https://t.co/0KqlrWUZHA)  [sea.open](https://twitter.com/opensea)的邮件给我的任务，甚至标记都没有上。确实有很多被 NFT 相关的特例，是被标记了，看起来也禁止在[@opensea](https://twitter.com/opensea)上偷看，同样可以在@ [the_x22](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)上和[@the_x22](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)上他们在所有被偷听的 NFT 销售情况，LOOKS RARE 平台已经成为那些低等黑客已经杀掉最大的赃物了，因为[@the_x2y2](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)还至少有点良知，至少知道为什么交易给了提示， @ [LooksRare](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)你们的平台将不会出现，你们的平台除了就是你量量的脏货，为什么在给offer，总是会卖到被盗的NFT ? 你们学艺不精只能靠偷东西为什么做脏事的让你们潜伏着有流动性，让我们这些喜欢NFT的人知道连环损失，你们现在却连X2Y2也干掉了X2Y2的盘算，现在却连X2Y2也干了你们应该也是默认交易量的吧，我都看得出来在对刷，你们这么装盲？

```
   我帮大家把我的事件，或者可以我翻译一下，并@相关的平台，希望

   让@opensea可以处理我们的邮件，他们这一年赚的钱请及时人[真正](https://twitter.com/opensea)没有困难。

   让@ [thex2y2](https://twitter.com/opensea)、[@opensea ](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)、@看[Rare](https://twitter.com/LooksRare)将被偷走 NFT 打标，并出售。

   请让那些被 NFT 的持有者杀毒的流动性，让他们得到更多的保护办法，让等寄生虫的那些偷物再一次被偷偷的偷偷的性质，并没有任何通过降低的办法。 ，让那些发了PASS的人请先加强自己的社区管理。当然同时我们也应该增强自己的风险意识，避免被这种网站钓鱼。
```

NFT 的共识不应该是激烈夺取，我希望更多的是的传递。

NFT 的流动应该只是交易者的麻烦，我同时也是偷窃者的镣铐。

NFT 的未来不应该是赚了钱就软地毯，是希望共同进步让我的市场更加新生。

```
 活动进展：

 很多朋友说的看起来都是乱序的，所以在前面我重新整理了一遍。

 在发布文案之后，我收到了很多圈内热心人的鼓励和支持。有的说带我打土狗，有的我一些钱包安全方面的知识。

 非常感谢大家，让我在这样的绝境中证明，我仍然很想拥抱web3、拥抱NFT。

 本次活动我的闺蜜也表示，同时我也表示，并继续学习，努力，希望能有回报。

 要特别感谢这位同志的名字命名[@hijasper](https://twitter.com/hiJasperNG) @hijasper，他在信中告诉我mfer help mfer，并购买并给了我一个特别感谢的人，还把我其中一个加到了mfer的群里。

 像[@the_x2y2](https://twitter.com/the_x2y2)这样感慨的平台方，在第一帮我把我把也有遗弃的NFT打标签上了。

 希望引起大家的关注和分享的事件可以引起我的关注和分享。
```

title: Project Galaxy
body:
## Project Galaxy 是啥？

### 对用户来说：

一站式nft活动平台——激励用户产生凭证数据，凭证就是打标签！

### 对项目方来说：

web3营销增长平台——利用用户产生的凭证数据，用标签选用户搞活动做增长！

***web3 App Store***

## 具体咋做的？

### Project Galaxy 提供的产品

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dm-S-B8664U](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dm-S-B8664U)

* Application Module 应用程序模块
  1. Galaxy OATs（on-chain achievement tokens，链上成就代币=poap）：

     用于用户执行操作或参与特定事件时的验证（给用户打标签！）

     例如，用户在 AAVE 上参与借贷，保持良好的贷款记录、未曾遭遇清算、积极参与项目治理。还会收集链下行为数据包括 Twitter、Discord、Github的参与情况等（验证有合约也有人工）

     “是为了项目方在Project Galaxy 组织活动将 NFT 徽章分发给社区用户的解决方案”
  2. Galaxy NFT 顾客忠诚计划 ：支持项目方发起活动，定制发什么奖励（支持NFT奖励、空投、盲盒和多活动组合）、奖励发给谁（定制or选择OAT：满足此标签的用户）、以及何时发等限制条件等。nft奖励和凭证oat可以不是一件事！

     rabbithole：用户参加活动，完成操作流程后验证得到项目方的token奖励

     poap：用户参加活动，验证资格后得到一枚poap。

     project galaxy：用参加活动户验证资格后得到一个OAT凭证；项目方在根据oat凭证分类用户进一步做营销活动发nft奖励；OAT本身对用户是一种资产，对项目方是用户信息筛选工具，且颗粒度更细。
* Galaxy ID：Galaxy ID 利用 Galaxy Credentials 代表用户在 Web3 中的did身份。
* Galaxy Vote：使项目方能够利用 Snapshot 上基于凭证的 NFT 来定制的治理系统
* Credential凭证API：提供更为定制化的凭证数据使用场景
* Credential Oracle Engine（凭证预言机引擎） ：coming soon 开发人员可以使用凭证 预言机引擎从智能合约中查询凭证数据，进行信贷评分or防止女巫攻击。

### curator策展人

Credential凭证：用户在链上or链下（如Defi, Gamefi, DAO, Twitter等)行为凭证，用来判断用户是否有资格参与某些活动（判断方式是检查用户是否拥有此资格的OAT）

curator：Credentials凭证数据的提供和整理者（给用户打标签的人）。在项目经济模型里，如果 curator 提供、整理的数据被其他项目方使用，curator 则会得到以通证 $GAL 结算的报酬。

Credentials凭证集一部分是由项目方想做活动而上传的， 另一部分也会由专门搜集这类凭证的人上传，理论上任何人都可以成为  curator  。

生态长久发展的关键，就在于如果可以持续吸引到 Curator 创造更多有价值的凭证数据集，更多的协议便会采用这些数据集来更好的分析用户，这会为 Curator 带来更多的收入，进一步激励他们提供更好的数据集为项目方所用，这会使得project galaxy项目进入良性循环产生飞轮效应。

### $GAL：

除治理价值外，$GAL 是 Project Galaxy 生态内的交易媒介。使用应用程序模块需要以 $GAL 支付费用。开发者使用凭证数据集需要用 $GAL 支付，这个费用会分配给 Data Curator 及社区金库。使用 Galaxy Oracle Engine 和 Galaxy Credential API 服务也需要支付 $GAL 使用。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NHNlmvQ3DD8CHYh20xp7D.png?height=867&width=1787)

### 看看实例

## 总结：

### project galaxy要做web3 App Store

### project galaxy生态的护城河其实是用户数据包（相比poap、兔子洞）

## 思考：

1\.数据自主权、让消费者拥有自己的数据价值是 Web3 最主要的叙事之一。

但你的个人数据本身毫无价值，你在整个这个过程里也没有得到也体会不到价值

把个人信息数据聚合起来才会有价值，Project Galaxy的价值就在于此，如果建立起一个真正的个人凭证数据的网络，相当于建立起一个加密世界的用户数据中台，web3项目方可能会离不开他！

2\.用户做任务肝nft奖励本身行为是无聊枯燥的，根本只有一个需求：为了取得项目当前的参与凭证以获得项目后期更高的回报（我认为对nft的收藏or交易需求都很弱很弱）

但这是个黑盒！很大可能后期是没有回报的，长此以往项目越来越多，得到的奖励nft也越来越同质化失去价值，对用户失去吸引力，凭证

现在个人的链上成就凭证，除了展示没有被利用起来，像个附属品，那如果有一个平台，能把这些oat能用起来  是不是好一点

3\.对于项目方这是个低级的获客手段吗？来的人是好用户吗？

如果从产品的角度出发

如果从需求的角度出发

是不是这就是web3根本需求？

结合以上三点启发：

web3根本需求是不是不会变？因为这也是人类的根本需求之一   就是fi

做social本身，至少现在看来什么数据归个人所有，都没用，不够硬，跨平台算是进步但也不关键。

从这个角度，就不是提供social  而是提供socialfi

比如这些相同通证的人，再怎么通过socialfi搞钱

## 项目发展历程

## 团队

Harry Zhang 是该项目的联合创始人兼项目负责人。Harry 曾做过 Club Factory（当时印度第三大电子商务平台）的数据产品负责人。步入区块链领域后 Harry 担任过 Lino Network 的联合创始人兼首席运营官，以及 DLive.tv 的联合创始人，带领团队打造了每月为超过 1000 万活跃用户提供服务的产品。 
 Charles Wayn是Project Galaxy 的联合创始人兼战略主管。Charles曾在DLive.tv担任联合创始人兼首席执行官。在2019年 DLive并入BitTorrent后，Charles成为了BitTorrent互动娱乐副总裁，管理包括DLive.tv、DLive Protocol和Two App在内的多个流媒体业务部门。

二位分别在 2016-2017 年以及 2017-2018 年担任过伯克利华人创业协会主席。

DLive.tv：Wilson（cycberconnect的创始人）2017 年在美国硅谷第一次互联网创业，创立了视频直播区块链公司DLive.tv 。2019 年底被 BitTorrent 公司全资收购。

## 节点事件

**2021.3——**启动Project Galaxy

**2021.5.4——种子轮融资**

 Project Galaxy 种子轮由 Multicoin Capital等机构以及部分加密货币项目的创始人共同参投.未公布金额

**2021.5.4——**第一个合作：Alpaca Finance

之后陆续合作的顶级项目：Yearn Finance Perpetual Protocol  CoinList CoinGecko 等

**2021.8.24——第一个活动** 价值 3亿美元“Shadowy Super Coder” NFT 包： Project Galaxy 与 Tenderly、Alchemy、Polygon、Gitcoin、Ankr、Parsiq、Torus、Quicknode、Curvegrid 和 OneKey 合作，为超过10w名符合条件的区块链开发人员提供“Shadowy Super Coder”NFT 包。该套餐包括一个特别设计的 Shadowy Coder NFT，以及价值 3 亿美元的各种独家福利。

**2021.9.24** ——币安智能链 (BSC) 合作，为最有价值建设者计划 III的获奖者提供独家 NFT 徽章。（galaxy 11月也加入了这个孵化项目）

**2021.12.22——假日寻宝活动**

 Yearn Finance、Alpaca Finance、Perpetual Protocol、Moonpot、zkLink、Hashflow、Woo Finance、Impossible Finance、Vera、Kaco Finance、Naos Finance 和 Divergence Protocol 联合举办

从合作伙伴那里做任务收集 12 个 NFT，然后可以领取特殊的 Galaxy NFT 银河女孩（强调作为早期凭证 未来的福利）  

爆款活动 推特8000+转推  中日英阿拉伯都挺多的   内部社区氛围社区感很强！

最后7000人完成任务获得奖励 各个项目均有一定增长

**2021.12.31——**社区通话  演讲性质

**2022.1.7前**——上线Galaxy OAT和GalaxyID    id也拉了一波增长 

**2022.1.25 ——融资1000w美元**

Multicoin Capital 和 Dragonfly Capital 领投。参投机构还包括 Spartan Group、Sky9 Capital、Coinbase Ventures 和 Binance Smart Chain Growth Fund等。

**2022.2月期间**——Meta Cowboy on Galaxy！参与银河计划的 20/30/45/65/99次分别对应一个nft

**2022.2.11——“**2022 is gonna be SOL Cool” 活动，Solana 生态的 27 个顶级项目，收集 27 个 NFT 中的 22 个以解锁 Galaxy Dr Sol NFT。（ 33,400 名新用户加入了该活动，每个唯一用户平均在 Solana 上尝试 5 种协议，4,826 名用户完成了 10 项以上任务。）

**2022.2.11**——$gal Coinlist公募

顶级公募平台Coinlist，总额度1000 万枚GAL。GAL的公募共吸引了超过94w个账户参加打新，3w中签。拥有xxxnft。。。Galaxy 用户会有一个优先队列

Coinlist在公募中影响力比币安还要强，曾经的IMX、Mina、Flow、ICP、Fil等顶级项目、百倍币都在Coinlist参与公募，审核项目严格，筛选项目的眼光非常一流。

**2022.5.5**——$gal 上线币安交易所

title: Manifoldを使ってNFTコントラクトを作成するチュートリアル
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_G0lJFNFtl5lIAe8RdFo5.jpg?height=670&width=1024)

# Manifold（manifold.xyz）ってなに

* コーディング知識なくても自分のNFTコントラクトが作成できるツール
* データの格納はArweaveです、IPFSと違う方法で半永久に保存する分散型ストレージネットワーク
* データサイズの上限は200MB
* Ethereumメインネット（とテスト環境のRinkeby）だけ対応
* ERC-721（一品物に適する規格）とERC-1155（一品物も、同じものが複数あるもの（入札プレゼントとか）も作れる規格）に対応
* コントラクトデプロイ・NFTミント・ロイヤリティ設定にガス代は必要
* ミントしたあとも、ガス代払えばmetadataの変更は可能、例えばタイプミス修正とか、季節が変わったら背景も変わるなど特殊な作品も実現可能
* ERC-721でも一応ナンバリング（Nanika #1/10, Nanika #2/10…みたいなやつ）ができる機能があります（量が多いとガス代は跳ね上がります）
* ERC-1155で作ったものは一度に複数のアドレスにエアドロができる機能
* ホルダーのスナップショット機能もあります

## そもそも「独自コントラクト」とは何か

「独自コントラクト（略して独コン）」とは本来「**自分でSolidityというプログラミング言語でコードを書いたスマートコントラクト**」です、でも日本のNFTコミュニティでは多分ニュアンスが違って、「マーケットプレイス（特にOpenSea）共用コントラクト以外のコントラクト」という意味になってると私は思います

Manifold経由で作成されたコントラクトはあくまで「**Manifoldが提供してるテンプレから生成されたコントラクト**」です、Chocofactory経由もFoundation経由も同様です

でもManifold / Chocofactory / Foundation経由でデプロイしたコントラクトの所有者はクリエイター自身です、Web3というバズワードの哲学的にクリエイターはプラットフォームの共用コントラクトではなく、自分のコントラクトで自分の作品をミントすべきです

FoundationのCEOも言ってます

[https://twitter.com/saturnial/status/1489082568330731520](https://twitter.com/saturnial/status/1489082568330731520)

# 事前準備

1\. ガス代の準備、今30 gwei以下になることが多いので、0.02 ETHあれば大丈夫なはずです、もし120 gweiに高騰したら（単純に4倍になるわけではありませんが）0.08 ETHくらいでしょうか

2\. テスト環境のRinkeby上のテスト用ETHが要ります、このRinkeby Faucetから無料で受け取れます

[https://rinkebyfaucet.com/](https://rinkebyfaucet.com/)

自分のアドレスを入れて

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1gvPnKTTI_cB_QvsSYFsN.png?height=757&width=1396)

完了です

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/osB3NlJAOVem3sq1VRzTH.png?height=1045&width=1344)

Rinkeby上のテスト用0.1 ETHもらってます、当然このETHは売れません

[https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x705a3c4f7c939e626915bf2a134d6abc444231921493dfa7f9326502697d7d20](https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x705a3c4f7c939e626915bf2a134d6abc444231921493dfa7f9326502697d7d20)

3\. Manifoldのアカウント

<https://studio.manifold.xyz> にアクセスして

[https://studio.manifold.xyz/](https://studio.manifold.xyz/)

Connectして署名して

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m_VFR_neyrVCYM9GqHLPP.png?height=799&width=906)

登録して完了です

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mzltAhIq6P8AGkxTaDL-s.png?height=1237&width=1117)

# 実際にやってみる（ERC-1155）

### テスト用コントラクトをデプロイ

<https://>[studio.manifold.xyz](https://studio.manifold.xyz) にアクセスしてNew contract

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Fy-JgBLXlLGYcwdhWo4co.png?height=313&width=1663)

* Contract nameはunicode対応
* Symbolは英字大文字
* ASCII markはこだわりがなければ適当でいいです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pv4da4ns0nOILFJvmGDzA.png?height=1147&width=1636)

Deploy on Rinkeby押してウォレットでトランザクション通して、3～5分くらい待てばVerifyまで進むはずです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6SBN2NOcIA_c3vO0XlzFT.png?height=682&width=810)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F_ScokVqL6CKjs_6yhgfh.png?height=529&width=823)

### テスト用NFTをミント

Rinkeby上にテスト用のNFTをミントします（一応この手順はスキップできますが、やっておきましょうね）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-rueza1FQxJbzdjB0lofT.png?height=981&width=1681)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IJ9aHhVH_G8UlrBI7AiF7.png?height=600&width=1675)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YCOGiKAKmKUE9lCA1Dc5E.png?height=1390&width=1834)

下の方に属性（Properties）項目があります、キャラの髪色とか、服装とか、背景のロケ地とか、いろいろ自由に設定できます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3wsHPo_WJOdEB2OtI0EIM.png?height=388&width=1114)

ミントするときの受取先は「Airdrop」と「自分」が選べます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pGcKtZqx2Kk0jt8cHKkca.png?height=744&width=1108)

ERC-1155ならAirdropの受取先は一度に複数のアドレスにミントできます、ガス代節約になります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3BGY-KupFj9UJBzeSciHM.png?height=879&width=1213)

Airdropのトランザクションを通してVerifyが完了すると大量に🔥と💎が画面に湧いてきます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UlwjD1PAYZkO5pieClgMT.png?height=1425&width=2038)

### 本番環境（ETHメインネット）にコントラクトをデプロイ

いよいよイーサリアムのメインネットにデプロイします、一度デプロイすると、名前・シンボル・タイプ（ERC-721 / ERC-1155）・ASCIIアートは永久に変更できないので、タイプミスがないか、本当にこの名前でいいか、よくチェックしてから進んでください

DashboardのDeploy on mainnetを押して

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bbxL0CIvcnYxnm9ylg-HJ.png?height=1048&width=1690)

ここはガス代が要ります、実際は0.0057 ETHを使いました

[https://etherscan.io/tx/0x8e122522e64fed94a1f06f3497378d3f4e916d89aac01ac7ca24ae340d8f43c6](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x8e122522e64fed94a1f06f3497378d3f4e916d89aac01ac7ca24ae340d8f43c6)

トランザクションが通したらVerifyまで待ちます、Rinbekyでやったことと同じです

### 本番環境（ETHメインネット）にNFTをミント

先にRinkebyに作ったNFTをイーサリアムのメインネットにデプロイします、Mint on Mainnetを押して受取先を選びます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1ZDVkIq0l6YgOH3jp7naQ.png?height=1153&width=1869)

テスト用のものと違い、本番用はArweaveにアップロードするので時間がかかります、場合によって10分以上かかることもあります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rRbeKKHD2UVoZHKYAZ8_J.png?height=702&width=609)

Awaiting signatureまで進んだらミントのトランザクションです、ガス代は要ります、2つのアドレスにAirdropして0.0048 ETHを使いました

[https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb5f295e00478a76d9124c91435a35e56b2b98146d2d2717b307e68ce12705b1c](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb5f295e00478a76d9124c91435a35e56b2b98146d2d2717b307e68ce12705b1c)

🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥💎🔥

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nuSr3cI6PYEy4VMwmbTej.png?height=1339&width=1833)

ERC-1155ならあとから追加ミントもできます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6TVG1Xz_BbCsi4u1y3RAl.png?height=1131&width=1132)

### ロイヤリティ設定

別にロイヤリティ要らない人はスキップしてください

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nK8loxslhx8ZygMCdRHqs.png?height=1240&width=838)

「OpenSea以外のマーケットプレイス（LooksRareやRarible）」でのロイヤリティ受取先とパーセントを設定します、OpenSea上のロイヤリティは赤いリンクから別途設定する必要があります

![4.2069%やりたいですけど小数点4桁はサポートされてませんね……](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dFJKw5B5-JbYZMlcKFJQD.png?height=769&width=1606)

当然直接にコントラクトからでも設定できます、basisPoints: 810はロイヤリティ8.1%という意味です

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7KhQgaHNJM2EYJm98doPX.png?height=460&width=922)


---

## 実際にやってみる（ERC-721）

基本的にはERC-1155と大差ないです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l8qjq6OWm-Y4aoQ9TmRpz.png?height=844&width=1669)

しかしAirdropは一度に1つのアドレスへしかミントできません

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UnLVhA0kI3D8amrIne6Si.png?height=652&width=813)

同じものをナンバリングにしてミントする機能もありますが

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JkYyeRdphml_LC9IkoMjG.png?height=460&width=622)

こっちは1つだけのガス代

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dlxEKf5SD1fr58lVfj-G4.png?height=535&width=477)

こっちは#1, #2, #3を一斉にミントするガス代、高くなります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7aEp_t-J2oRZtjxu5IZqL.png?height=529&width=463)


---

## 各マーケットプレイスで確認

ERC-721で作ったほうはOpenSeaでは自分でコレクションの名前を設定する必要がありました、なんで……

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JKZz4AMZQMKuUqEkFkXE3.png?height=1221&width=1890)

LooksRareやRaribleは普通にmetadataとロイヤリティ読み込めてます

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5rOjxCm_NhOHsPXkNz0p7.png?height=1570&width=1777)

ERC-1155で作った方、LooksRareでは上手くコレクションタイトルと作品タイトルが表示できません

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5jETs_aoWnpMy32gAv2Lr.png?height=1732&width=2010)

OpenSeaとRaribleでは問題ないです

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qXlAbKeVULSdjtlBlL06F.png?height=1635&width=2098)


---

## 他にいろいろ

現時点のガス代教えてくれたり

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/t2I0lfoIToQBPQ7bBIOpX.png?height=678&width=463)

ホルダースナップショット機能もあります

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/G1yfqXIuxMho27GIdm9rv.png?height=342&width=1111)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4lA3QgNM0q-nyn1Pax7Dz.png?height=925&width=1183)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fO_4iVPq9vEV93462KbgC.png?height=786&width=1195)


---

# 最後になにか

記事を書くために約0.03 ETHを使ったので、もし寄付する感じでよくわからないなにかを購入すると助かります、あえてOpenSeaではないマーケットプレイスのリンクを出します

~~売れる気はありません~~

（2022年3月14日追記）「なにか」が売れてしまいました😳😳😳 [龍犬](https://twitter.com/ryuudog2)さん本当にありがとうございます🙏😭

よくわからないすごいなにか、0.039 ETH、ERC-721規格の一品物です、Raribleにどうでもいいアンロックコンテンツがあります

[https://rarible.com/token/0x91476502b93e73f5458aac1c133ab4b7c299982b:1?tab=details](https://rarible.com/token/0x91476502b93e73f5458aac1c133ab4b7c299982b:1?tab=details)

[https://looksrare.org/collections/0x91476502b93e73F5458AAc1c133aB4B7c299982b/1](https://looksrare.org/collections/0x91476502b93e73F5458AAc1c133aB4B7c299982b/1)

ショボーンさんの顔面、0.0069 ETH、供給量69、ERC-1155規格のものです

[https://rarible.com/token/0x6b321c1f6f94ae1641e03bdf0752061fba71924d:1](https://rarible.com/token/0x6b321c1f6f94ae1641e03bdf0752061fba71924d:1)

我不是很明白有了雄三为什么还要买鱼叉这种残废🤨0.85马赫，90kg装药的幼儿园战斗部，而且还是未增程的原版block2。全方位被雄三压制，到底看上这玩意哪里了？平台适装性？

title: Lesson #6: Launchpads
body:
With this flurry of new projects and ideas appearing in crypto, a new problem arose: these projects, not necessarily big or connected enough to be VC-backed, needed a way to raise funds for their operations and development, as well as to provide inital liquidity for their token on AMMs. At first, **Initial Coin Offerings** (**ICO**) were used, resembling classic fundraising events but more retail-oriented and with tokens as a reward for investors instead of shares. However, seeing as **Initial Coin Offerings** (**ICO**) were centralized and increasingly regulated, new models appeared, often operated by launchpads as decentralized (therefore considered trust-less) intermediaries.

These launchpads would allow project teams to sell part of the supply of their tokens before release, and raise funds through this sale. This is usually referred to as an **Initial Decentralized Offering** (**IDO**).

These often include one or more of the following mechanics:

* Selling only to people who hold/stake/provide liquidity for the launchpad’s token
* Dutch auction → Price that gets lower with each buy, same price for all at the end
* Buying with launchpad’s token or liquidity → **Initial Farm Offering** (**IFO**)
* Instant locking of some or all raised funds as liquidity (to “prevent rug-pulls”)
* Seeding liquidity with a **Liquidity Bootstrapping Pool** (**LBP**), setting the initial price and gradually adapting to the pool

Major projects will often opt for major launchpads and even sometimes multiple launchpads to reach a bigger audience and benefit from a bigger fundraising capacity, but of course any project at this early stage can just as much be a hidden gem as it can be a “rug pull” or scam.

## Examples:

* **[Polkastarter](https://www.polkastarter.com/)**: Multi-chain launchpad originally focused on Polkadot projects
* **[The DAO Maker](https://daomaker.com/)**: Ethereum launchpad
* **[Ignition Launchpad](https://ignition.paidnetwork.com/)**: Ethereum Launchpad
* **[Thorstarter](https://thorstarter.org/)**: Launchpad for projects linked to *[Thorchain](https://www.thorchain.com/)* and/or multi-chain
* **[PancakeSwap](https://pancakeswap.finance/ifo)**: AMM with an IFO section for fund raises, main fundraising platform on BSC

title: Lesson #5: DEX Aggregators
body:
*All these AMMs have different prices and fees! How do I know the best place to swap my tokens?*

Due to slippage and differences in swap algorithms, arbitrage, fees and available pairs, different AMMs usually have different prices and costs associated to swap between two specific tokens, especially since one swap can have multiple steps and each step could have different costs on different AMMs. For a while, this made executing an efficient swap a time-consuming matter.

## The rise of aggregators

Fortunately, DEX aggregators were created in order to quash this issue. “*But what are they and how do they work?*” you ask.

Well, DEX aggregators are protocols that will find the optimal route for you to swap your desired tokens and bundle all the necessary steps into one transaction, optimized for transaction fees or “gas”. Sometimes this will include going through specific routes on one AMM or even executing multiple swaps on multiple AMMs within the same transaction.

For you, the end user, this is completely transparent. The interface works just like an AMM, select token A, select token B, enter the amount of token A to swap and the interface tells you the amount of token B you will receive and the expected amount of slippage, with the route specified underneath. The difference being, the route can include different protocols rather than just one.

This means that by using DEX aggregators instead of normal AMMs, you will save time and money, and this will be very beneficial to your trading. Some even allow you to place limit orders, in order to more effectively manage your entries and take-profits.

## Examples:

* **[1inch](https://app.1inch.io/)**: Multi-chain DEX aggregator with limit orders and gas tokens
* **[Matcha](https://matcha.xyz/)**: Multi-chain DEX aggregator built on the *[0x protocol](https://0x.org/)*
* **[Cowswap](https://cowswap.exchange/)**: Ethereum and Gnosis Chain DEX aggregator with MEV protection, fees are paid on the token and do not require a transaction to swap

*Version française disponible sur **[Muchcoin](https://www.muchco.in/academy/agregateurs-de-dex)***

title: BLK Finance Fair Launch I: Initial NFT Offering
body:
In anticipation of our upcoming launch, we’re officially announcing our Initial NFT Offering which is the first part of a two part Fair Launch strategy, and aims to distribute supply of BLKD as fairly as possible among our early on-chain supporters and supporters of Black and African builders across Web3 alike.

By participating in the primary mint of Abstract Diaspora Club (formerly ‘Friends of Basquiat’), users can secure a bag of BLKD, at initial price discovery, in a non-competitive environment. The public sale will be through custom contracts, on our native [website](https://www.blk.fiance), created and facilitated by our friends over at [Nervous Net](https://www.nervous.net/). This sale will not only allow for an easy way to conduct a presale to bootstrap the protocol’s liquidity, it’ll also help us identify our earliest users and adopters. NFT holders will also be the first beneficiaries of the rewards and additional permissions offered through our DeFi arm.

!["Friends of Basquiat" is now "Abstract Diaspora Club"](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZMi9o2rQUseXRudE2O2O2.png?height=1080&width=1920)

### Abstract Diaspora Club Overview

As our first NFT collection, we will focus on honoring one of the most prominent and highest selling, post-mortem, Black painters and artists of all time, Jean Michael-Basquiat, in collaboration with Animation artist, and musician [HighWestHus](https://twitter.com/HighWesthus).

These generative pieces will include elements inspired by his signature style of abstract expressionism, while also including attributes representing diversity and inclusion. Effectively giving our platform an aesthetic identity outside of our economic structure and mission, while also providing initial liquidity to treasury and LPs.

Mint Price: 0.05 ETH
Editions: 10,000
Attributes: 200+

No Roadmap
No Whitelists No Private Sale
No Discord Grinding

Similar to popular art generating reserve currency projects, such as Squid DAO and NOUNS, this collection aims to bring a stream of revenue to our DAO’s treasury, and support our commitment to funding Black and African creatives. In addition, these tokens will act as a non-inflationary tool and an effective alternative to excessive rebasing tokenomics.

### Fair Launch Strategy Part I

Public mint purchases will be done Ethereum mainnet.

It will open on **June 10th, 2022** at 06:00 UTC, and will run until **June 16th, 2022** at 06:00 UTC.

On the presale public mint launch date, there will be a post in the *#announcements* channel of our community [Discord](https://discord.gg/XCFTMnky) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TheBlackDAO) detailing how to participate. Users will have until the end of the pre-sale period to mint an NFT (Mint price around 0.05 ETH) on our native website, to be eligible to receive the initial token.

**The Primary Sale Allocation:**

10% - The Artist
10% - [Nervous Net](https://www.nervous.net/)
10% - Team & Partnerships
70% - Treasury (SLPs)

Users will then be airdropped BLKD tokens once the protocol is deployed to mainnet. While the pre-sale period will only last a week, mint will be ongoing until the collection sells out. Once the presale is complete, additional primary sale allocations will be subject to governance. Again its important to note that the NFTs will also act as a signifier of our platform's earliest supporters which will lead to future rewards and permissions within the ecosystem.

The majority of contributed ETH will then be paired with BLKD tokens in our treasury and added to SushiSwap Liquidity Pools (SLPs). Note that once added, liquidity tokens will not be removed from the LP pools and will be locked in perpetuity in the Treasury. Once the presale is complete, additional primary sale allocations will be subject to  governance.

In practice this means that the pre-sale mint will be the first price discovery event for BLKD. See our [documentation](https://docs.blk.finance/) for more information on the breakdown of the initial mint and token allocation. For more details on the Abstract Diaspora collection, check out our previous post [here](https://mirror.xyz/theblackdao.eth/_MZ82vF_pvC23hVoQWqDaFSRgTkirXcIEq6uFe4oxUE).

## Bootstrapping Liquidity

By contributing to the presale you are funding the SLPs, and bootstrapping the protocol’s liquidity pools.

Initial NFT Offerings have been used successfully by many teams to successfully distribute tokens to their community, and they provide powerful tools for doing so in a capital efficient manner, but they also require capital in order to bootstrap them. This cost has up until this point been handled internally by our core contributors and through the support of our partners over at [The Raid Guild](https://www.raidguild.org/) and [OlympusDAO](https://www.olympusdao.finance/).

Deploying our Fair Launch Strategy in the coming weeks will enable The Black DAO to efficiently bootstrap and reward community participation, without the need for external funding (from VCs, etc) to kick start the protocol.

## Risks and Disclaimers

**RISKS: 
  
 Please keep in mind that this is a high risk economic experiment, and like all crypto investments, we do no recommend to contribute to BLK Finance with funds that you can’t afford to lose**. No statements made by the Black DAO in any capacity, or medium,  should be viewed as financial advice.

The smart contracts for BLK Finance are currently [undergoing audits](https://mirror.xyz/theblackdao.eth/iV4gC7KUHV9mpP26WlPlvs72urIncw2nl3BUtOvVdCY) by [Spade Solidity Audits](https://twitter.com/SpadeAudits). They have also undergone thorough informal internal and external review by multiple 3rd-parties. While results of the audit are optimistic, the report wont be released to the public until after contract deployment. However, the report will be released prior to the protocol. 
  
 **DISCLAIMER:**

THIS POST IS NOT INTENDED TO CONSTITUTE AN OFFER TO SELL, OR SOLICITATION OF AN OFFER TO BUY, ANY SECURITIES. ANY AND ALL SECURITIES REFERRED TO HEREIN HAVE NOT BEEN REGISTERED UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT OF 1933, AS AMENDED, OR UNDER APPLICABLE U.S. STATE OR FOREIGN SECURITIES LAWS. NEITHER THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION NOR ANY U.S. STATE OR FOREIGN SECURITIES COMMISSION HAS PASSED UPON THE ACCURACY OR ADEQUACY OF THE CONTENTS HEREOF. NO REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR ASSURANCE IS MADE REGARDING THE ACCURACY OF THE INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN, AND IT IS NOT INTENDED TO BE RELIED UPON BY ANY PERSON. THE INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN MAY NOT REFLECT SUBSEQUENT DEVELOPMENTS. NOTHING SET FORTH HEREIN IS INTENDED TO BE LEGAL, TAX OR FINANCIAL ADVICE TO ANY PERSON.

THE FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS IN THIS PAPER ARE SUBJECT TO NUMEROUS ASSUMPTIONS, RISKS AND UNCERTAINTIES WHICH ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OVER TIME. THERE ARE MANY RISK FACTORS, INCLUDING THOSE RELATING TO BLOCKCHAIN AND CRYPTOGRAPHIC TECHNOLOGY GENERALLY, AS WELL THE BLACK DAO’S (PAN-AFRICAN WEALTH DAO,LLC) BUSINESS, OPERATIONS AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS, THAT COULD CAUSE ACTUAL RESULTS OR DEVELOPMENTS ANTICIPATED BY US NOT TO BE REALIZED IN WHOLE OR IN PART OR, EVEN IF SUBSTANTIALLY REALIZED, TO FAIL TO ACHIEVE ANY OR ALL OF THE BENEFITS THAT COULD BE EXPECTED THEREFROM. WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO CHANGE THE PLANS, EXPECTATIONS AND INTENTIONS STATED HEREIN AT ANY TIME AND FOR ANY REASON, IN OUR SOLE AND ABSOLUTE DISCRETION, AND, EXCEPT AS MAY BE OTHERWISE REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAW,  WE UNDERTAKE NO OBLIGATION TO UPDATE PUBLICLY OR REVISE ANY FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENT, WHETHER AS A RESULT OF NEW INFORMATION, FUTURE DEVELOPMENTS OR OTHERWISE. ACCORDINGLY, WE RECOMMEND THAT YOU DO NOT RELY ON, AND DO NOT MAKE ANY FINANCIAL DECISION OR INVESTMENT BASED ON, THE STATEMENTS CONTAINED IN THIS PAPER --- INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY SELLING OR TRADING OF  ETHER OR ANY OTHER CRYPTOGRAPHIC OR BLOCKCHAIN TOKEN, OR THE SECURITIES OF ANY COMPANY OR OTHER ORGANIZATION OR GROUP.

title: BLK Finance Fair Launch I: Initial NFT Offering
body:
In anticipation of our upcoming launch, we’re officially announcing our Initial NFT Offering which is the first part of a two part Fair Launch strategy, and aims to distribute supply of BLKD as fairly as possible among our early on-chain supporters and supporters of Black and African builders across Web3 alike.

By participating in the primary mint of Abstract Diaspora Club (formerly ‘Friends of Basquiat’), users can secure a bag of BLKD, at initial price discovery, in a non-competitive environment. The public sale will be through custom contracts, on our native [website](https://www.blk.fiance), created and facilitated by our friends over at [Nervous Net](https://www.nervous.net/). This sale will not only allow for an easy way to conduct a presale to bootstrap the protocol’s liquidity, it’ll also help us identify our earliest users and adopters. NFT holders will also be the first beneficiaries of the rewards and additional permissions offered through our DeFi arm.

!["Friends of Basquiat" is now "Abstract Diaspora Club"](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZMi9o2rQUseXRudE2O2O2.png?height=1080&width=1920)

### Abstract Diaspora Club Overview

As our first NFT collection, we will focus on honoring one of the most prominent and highest selling, post-mortem, Black painters and artists of all time, Jean Michael-Basquiat, in collaboration with Animation artist, and musician [HighWestHus](https://twitter.com/HighWesthus).

These generative pieces will include elements inspired by his signature style of abstract expressionism, while also including attributes representing diversity and inclusion. Effectively giving our platform an aesthetic identity outside of our economic structure and mission, while also providing initial liquidity to treasury and LPs.

Mint Price: 0.05 ETH
Editions: 10,000
Attributes: 200+

No Roadmap
No Whitelists No Private Sale
No Discord Grinding

Similar to popular art generating reserve currency projects, such as Squid DAO and NOUNS, this collection aims to bring a stream of revenue to our DAO’s treasury, and support our commitment to funding Black and African creatives. In addition, these tokens will act as a non-inflationary tool and an effective alternative to excessive rebasing tokenomics.

### Fair Launch Strategy Part I

Public mint purchases will be done Ethereum mainnet.

It will open on **June 10th, 2022** at 06:00 UTC, and will run until **June 16th, 2022** at 06:00 UTC.

On the presale public mint launch date, there will be a post in the *#announcements* channel of our community [Discord](https://discord.gg/XCFTMnky) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TheBlackDAO) detailing how to participate. Users will have until the end of the pre-sale period to mint an NFT (Mint price around 0.05 ETH) on our native website, to be eligible to receive the initial token.

**The Primary Sale Allocation:**

10% - The Artist
10% - [Nervous Net](https://www.nervous.net/)
10% - Team & Partnerships
70% - Treasury (SLPs)

Users will then be airdropped BLKD tokens once the protocol is deployed to mainnet. While the pre-sale period will only last a week, mint will be ongoing until the collection sells out. Once the presale is complete, additional primary sale allocations will be subject to governance. Again its important to note that the NFTs will also act as a signifier of our platform's earliest supporters which will lead to future rewards and permissions within the ecosystem.

The majority of contributed ETH will then be paired with BLKD tokens in our treasury and added to SushiSwap Liquidity Pools (SLPs). Note that once added, liquidity tokens will not be removed from the LP pools and will be locked in perpetuity in the Treasury. Once the presale is complete, additional primary sale allocations will be subject to  governance.

In practice this means that the pre-sale mint will be the first price discovery event for BLKD. See our [documentation](https://docs.blk.finance/) for more information on the breakdown of the initial mint and token allocation. For more details on the Abstract Diaspora collection, check out our previous post [here](https://mirror.xyz/theblackdao.eth/_MZ82vF_pvC23hVoQWqDaFSRgTkirXcIEq6uFe4oxUE).

## Bootstrapping Liquidity

By contributing to the presale you are funding the SLPs, and bootstrapping the protocol’s liquidity pools.

Initial NFT Offerings have been used successfully by many teams to successfully distribute tokens to their community, and they provide powerful tools for doing so in a capital efficient manner, but they also require capital in order to bootstrap them. This cost has up until this point been handled internally by our core contributors and through the support of our partners over at [The Raid Guild](https://www.raidguild.org/) and [OlympusDAO](https://www.olympusdao.finance/).

Deploying our Fair Launch Strategy in the coming weeks will enable The Black DAO to efficiently bootstrap and reward community participation, without the need for external funding (from VCs, etc) to kick start the protocol.

## Risks and Disclaimers

**RISKS: 
  
 Please keep in mind that this is a high risk economic experiment, and like all crypto investments, we do no recommend to contribute to BLK Finance with funds that you can’t afford to lose**. No statements made by the Black DAO in any capacity, or medium,  should be viewed as financial advice.

The smart contracts for BLK Finance are currently [undergoing audits](https://mirror.xyz/theblackdao.eth/iV4gC7KUHV9mpP26WlPlvs72urIncw2nl3BUtOvVdCY) by [Spade Solidity Audits](https://twitter.com/SpadeAudits). They have also undergone thorough informal internal and external review by multiple 3rd-parties. While results of the audit are optimistic, the report wont be released to the public until after contract deployment. However, the report will be released prior to the protocol. 
  
 **DISCLAIMER:**

THIS POST IS NOT INTENDED TO CONSTITUTE AN OFFER TO SELL, OR SOLICITATION OF AN OFFER TO BUY, ANY SECURITIES. ANY AND ALL SECURITIES REFERRED TO HEREIN HAVE NOT BEEN REGISTERED UNDER THE SECURITIES ACT OF 1933, AS AMENDED, OR UNDER APPLICABLE U.S. STATE OR FOREIGN SECURITIES LAWS. NEITHER THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION NOR ANY U.S. STATE OR FOREIGN SECURITIES COMMISSION HAS PASSED UPON THE ACCURACY OR ADEQUACY OF THE CONTENTS HEREOF. NO REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR ASSURANCE IS MADE REGARDING THE ACCURACY OF THE INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN, AND IT IS NOT INTENDED TO BE RELIED UPON BY ANY PERSON. THE INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN MAY NOT REFLECT SUBSEQUENT DEVELOPMENTS. NOTHING SET FORTH HEREIN IS INTENDED TO BE LEGAL, TAX OR FINANCIAL ADVICE TO ANY PERSON.

THE FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS IN THIS PAPER ARE SUBJECT TO NUMEROUS ASSUMPTIONS, RISKS AND UNCERTAINTIES WHICH ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OVER TIME. THERE ARE MANY RISK FACTORS, INCLUDING THOSE RELATING TO BLOCKCHAIN AND CRYPTOGRAPHIC TECHNOLOGY GENERALLY, AS WELL THE BLACK DAO’S (PAN-AFRICAN WEALTH DAO,LLC) BUSINESS, OPERATIONS AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS, THAT COULD CAUSE ACTUAL RESULTS OR DEVELOPMENTS ANTICIPATED BY US NOT TO BE REALIZED IN WHOLE OR IN PART OR, EVEN IF SUBSTANTIALLY REALIZED, TO FAIL TO ACHIEVE ANY OR ALL OF THE BENEFITS THAT COULD BE EXPECTED THEREFROM. WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO CHANGE THE PLANS, EXPECTATIONS AND INTENTIONS STATED HEREIN AT ANY TIME AND FOR ANY REASON, IN OUR SOLE AND ABSOLUTE DISCRETION, AND, EXCEPT AS MAY BE OTHERWISE REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAW,  WE UNDERTAKE NO OBLIGATION TO UPDATE PUBLICLY OR REVISE ANY FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENT, WHETHER AS A RESULT OF NEW INFORMATION, FUTURE DEVELOPMENTS OR OTHERWISE. ACCORDINGLY, WE RECOMMEND THAT YOU DO NOT RELY ON, AND DO NOT MAKE ANY FINANCIAL DECISION OR INVESTMENT BASED ON, THE STATEMENTS CONTAINED IN THIS PAPER --- INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY SELLING OR TRADING OF  ETHER OR ANY OTHER CRYPTOGRAPHIC OR BLOCKCHAIN TOKEN, OR THE SECURITIES OF ANY COMPANY OR OTHER ORGANIZATION OR GROUP.
